import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Skills.scss' import Animation from '../Animation/Animation' import Loader from 'react-loaders' const Skills = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const array = ['S', 'k', 'i', 'l', 'l', 's'] useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) useEffect(() => {

Anything in here will be replaced on browsers that support the canvas element

  • Google
  • Fish
  • Chips
  • Salt
  • Vinegar
}) return ( <>
<h1>

</h1>
<p>

</p>

) } export default Skills
